title: 感谢每个看直播的人
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zx728925 于 2016-8-12 19:39 编辑 

Thanks to everyone who tuned into the stream yesterday! If you missed it, watch here and download the map yourself:http://mojang.com/2016/08/evil-live-our-devs-let-out-their-inner-villains-on-stream/
感谢每个昨天看过直播的人！（我也看了一部分）！如果你错过了直播，在这个网址观看视频并自己下载这个地图。




QQ截图20160812170159.png (10.87 KB, 下载次数: 2)
